text:

Iâ€™ve posted the prompt in the replies below. ğŸ‘‡ https://t.co/yJCXxaxG6A

A composiÃ§Ã£o de cena e os efeitos visuais ficaram simplesmente surreais. Para quem quiser aprender mais sobre o processo, vou montar uma thread aqui

text:
3âƒ£ Third experiment: 

Bringing a static image to lifeâ€¦ 
and giving it a voice. ğŸ—£ï¸ğŸ”Š

One simple prompt:

â€œWaitâ€¦ Seedance 2.0 works in CapCut now?! 
Iâ€™m obsessed.â€ https://t.co/wyl5a3l0dE

3D artists are cooked.

I made this in one prompt on CapCut with Seedance... https://t.co/L0VKRe4Ckg

DTC brands, listen up.

This is 100% AI.

Seedance 2 just changed the entire game for you.
Here's what just happened:

I gave it two images. That's it.

It handled everything lip sync, movement, sound effects, timing. Every tiny detail locked in.
No more:

Testing 50 prompt and https://t.co/9NgOkFoMWX

Seedance 2 is very good at following a detailed list of scenes in a single prompt:

1. open with an establishing fly over shot of a misty jungle in the early morning, a soldier (the woman in the image) is in a chopper in army uniform, she says "We're entering foh-fur country now. https://t.co/E32mPvb9lt

In this test Seedance 2 seamlessly handles switching away from a scene, to something completely different, and then back again.

Prompt:
1. two people in a cafe, one says, "did you ever see that foh-fur movie?", the other: "Yeah, I remember it well.."
2. cuts to a dark sci-fi https://t.co/gzTizrpJTZ

How differently do AI video models interpret the same prompt? We ran 4 to find out. Runway, Veo, Seedance, Grok. Same reference, same brief, side by side.

#GenerativeAI #AItools https://t.co/RCpeke5hOL

5 second video made with Seedance 2.0
incredible what can it make in just 5 seconds

prompt was: alien screams hasta la vista while the t-rex is running, then the t-rex stops and roars.. ğŸ˜‚

Seedance 2 joins the "cannot count to 10" club:

> a man counts out loud from 1 to 10, using his fingers and holding them up as he goes

Pretty sure this is a scary Ryan Reynolds/Ben Stiller hybrid.

(Variants of this prompt with the numbers explicitly listed also fail) https://t.co/uHLlPtwHhp

Seedance 2.0: First Try

I tried to see how the new model works for 15-second generations. I uploaded the first image, and my prompt was really simple:

Thanks again!! https://t.co/3vyQwucsHD
